works.description:
We are publishers of the Franz Bardon  
books on Hermetics, namely, Initiation into Hermetics, The Key to the True
 
Kabbalah, The Practice of Magical Evocation. We do not supply any  
downloadable copies of these works, either in pdf format or ebooks. There 

are a slew of sites that give our books away via these formats. If a
search  
is done for Initiation into Hermetics pdf or Initiation into Hermetics  
downloadable, these sites pop up. If someone does enter these keywords is 

there no way to not allow these sites to come up, or simply block those  
keywords.
